(cid:9)(cid:9)
IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT FOR THEOTZ
(cid:9)--
.-,•(cid:9) grr),(7/
MIDDLE DISTRICT OF NORTH CAROLINA ,=).(cid:9) 4 6L iiN
ig:)-(cid:9) 4/,.,/0 P.4,1
GREENSBORO,.NORTH CAROLINA
--.(cid:9) Clerk , ,v ,,i 4192,
GEORGE ROMNEY, SECRETARY, )
DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND )	 \WA;
.URBAN DEVELOPMENT,	 ) MISCELLANEOUS
) NO. M-137-71
Petitioner, )
v. )
ANDY TROXLER, )
) ORDER 
Respondent. )
It appearing that respondent, Andy Troxle • , refused
to comply with an investigative subpoena served on him
by an appropriate official of the Department of Housing
and Urban Development (HUD) pursuant to 42 USC 3611; that
refusal was based 011 the_ coritention that to comply would
expose him to possible criminal penalties, in violation
of his privilege against self-incrimination under the
Fifth Amendment to the Constitution; that it is well
settled that the Fifth Amendment privilege against self-
.
incrimination can be raised only to protect an individual
from making disclosures which could be used against him
in a criminal proceeding; and that the investigation in
this case is predicated on an alleged civil violation of
the Fair Housing Act of 1968, 42 USC 3601 et se q ., which
Act does not grant any criminal sanctions to the Depart-
ment of Housing and Urban Development:

It is therefore ORDERED that respondent Andy
with the requirements of the 
Troxler comply  subpoena
issued him by the Department of Hcusing and Urban
Development.
6Q,
nited Stakes District Judge

Camon J. Stuart, Clerk
